text_block_list.text:
Yoo-hoo, Trainer☆
I've brought some lucky news today!
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text: A collaboration campaign with 'Tokyo Mega Illumination' will be held!
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: I hear that things like Christmas presents being handed out every day will be happening, or—
...and events will be held where we make Christmas more exciting—
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text: ...or even getting items by tapping the petite gift placed here. It looks like there's a whole lot of happy events!
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey

text_block_list.text:
So, let's have fun together, okay?
Rickey☆ Lucky☆ Merry Christmas☆
text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
